name: lorenzos-claude-code
description: Lorenzo's Claude Code setup: 64 commands, 26 agents, 19 skills, 4 orchestrators, 29 MCP servers, 15 hooks, 3 context modes for 10x end-to-end development

context7.description: Access up-to-date documentation for any library

playwright.description: Browser automation and web testing capabilities

stripe.description: Stripe payment processing and API operations

chrome-devtools.description: Chrome DevTools debugging and performance analysis

vercel.description: Vercel deployment management and project operations

github.description: GitHub repository operations, issues, PRs, and CI/CD (requires GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN)

sequential-thinking.description: Structured problem-solving with step-by-step reasoning and hypothesis verification

postgres.description: PostgreSQL read-only database access and schema inspection (update connection string)

redis.description: Redis key-value store operations (update connection URL)

mongodb.description: MongoDB database operations and Atlas management (requires MDB_MCP_CONNECTION_STRING)

figma.description: Figma design file access and component inspection (requires FIGMA_ACCESS_TOKEN)

notion.description: Notion workspace access for docs and knowledge bases (requires NOTION_API_KEY)

linear.description: Linear issue tracking and project management (requires LINEAR_API_KEY)

slack.description: Slack workspace access for channel and message operations (requires SLACK_BOT_TOKEN)

memory.description: Persistent knowledge graph for cross-session context retention (set MEMORY_FILE_PATH env var)

terraform.description: Terraform infrastructure as code operations (requires TERRAFORM_CLOUD_TOKEN for Terraform Cloud)

kubernetes.description: Kubernetes cluster management and kubectl operations (uses current kubeconfig context)

docker.description: Docker container and image management operations (requires Docker daemon access)

sentry.description: Sentry error tracking and performance monitoring (requires SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN)

datadog.description: Datadog observability, metrics, and log analysis (requires DD_API_KEY and DD_APP_KEY)

aws.description: AWS services including S3, Lambda, DynamoDB, and CloudWatch (uses AWS credentials from environment)

atlassian.description: Jira and Confluence integration via OAuth 2.0 for issue tracking and documentation (requires Atlassian Cloud account)

firecrawl.description: Web scraping and crawling with LLM-powered extraction for research tasks (requires FIRECRAWL_API_KEY)

semgrep.description: Security vulnerability scanning with 5000+ rules for SAST analysis

tavily.description: AI-optimized web search for RAG workflows and research (requires TAVILY_API_KEY)

duckdb.description: Local analytics engine for CSV, Parquet, and SQL analysis without external database

gitlab.description: GitLab merge requests, pipelines, and issue tracking (requires GITLAB_TOKEN)
